description: CoroutineExceptionHandler not invoked despite exception. Handler installation or scope hierarchy issue.
commonCauses: Handler installed on child coroutine instead of root
Using async instead of launch (exceptions surface on await)
solutions: Use launch for fire-and-forget with handler
Don't catch exception before it reaches handler
Understand async exceptions surface on await()
Test handler invocation with various exceptions
prevention: Install CEH on CoroutineScope, not individual launches
Understand exception propagation in coroutine hierarchy
Use SupervisorScope for independent child failures
Monitor exception handler invocations in debug
examples: // NOT called: launch { async { throw Exception() }.await() } // Exception on await
